title: Update WhatsApp contact number and add game search functionality

requirements.text: Update the WhatsApp contact number from 918757242955 to 918757242995 in all Buy Now button links throughout the website

quotes: https://wa.me/918757242995 change old number contact to this number on this website & buy now to this new number

acceptanceCriteria: All Buy Now buttons redirect to https://wa.me/918757242995
The GameCard component uses the updated WhatsApp number
No references to the old number 918757242955 remain in the codebase

requirements.text: Add a search bar with a search icon at the top of the page that allows users to filter games by name in real-time

quotes: add search bar for games on top and search icon

acceptanceCriteria: Search bar is prominently displayed at the top of the game catalog section
Search icon is visible within or adjacent to the search input field
Typing in the search bar filters the displayed games by matching game names
Search is case-insensitive and updates results in real-time
Clearing the search bar shows all games again

constraints: Do not modify the backend schema or API endpoints
Maintain the existing white background with black text theme
Keep the horizontal scrolling layout for game catalog rows
nonGoals: Adding advanced search filters beyond game name
Implementing search by platform, price, or other attributes
Creating a dedicated search results page
